content: Mainly worked on building smart contract and web3 integration.
Built NFT contracts such as Rooster, Egg(ERC721), GAFF, GEM(ERC1155).
Built several utility contracts such as EggSale, EggHatch, Marketplace, Store, Betting, JackPot, Affiliate Marketing and so on.
Integrated web3 to React/Next frontend and FastAPI Backend.
